title: Rito just made me lose 3 LP.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
My thing glitched and I dodged.
WHY

replies.body: Unfortunately, I'm not seeing the problem in the screenshot.  Can you give me some more details and tell me exactly what's going on?  Happy to help just let me know.

Okay, I'm not really mad about it anymore but the client sort of lagged and my friends told me it was my turn to ban. Unfortunately, the counter was still at 0 when Summoner 5 was banning, forcing me to dodge. This has happened to me several times.
Hope you guys can find a way to fix this!~
From what i can tell, I think is client crashed in champ select, forcing him to dodge. I'v had it happen twice, both being in normales tho.
